meanings.sent1: The smell of the garbage was so yecchs that I had to hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: She made a yecchs face when she saw the slimy slug on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The yecchs look on his face when he tasted the bitter medicine was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie was filled with yecchs scenes that made the audience squirm.
meanings.sent5: The yecchs feeling of touching the sticky, gooey substance stayed with her all day.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of distaste or dislike.
meanings.sent1: Yecchs! I accidentally stepped on a squishy bug!
meanings.sent3: Yecchs, I can't believe I have to eat broccoli for dinner again.
meanings.sent4: The spoiled milk made me exclaim, 'Yecchs!'
meanings.sent5: Yecchs! The thought of eating snails makes me shudder.
